Html: Attempted to install the right components (Contracts, Silverlight, PowerTools, Pex) to get the whole project to build in VS2010.  Still struggling to get all the unit tests to pass - and some of the components would appear to need paid-for bits from MS Research.  Is there any more documentation on configuring for VS2010 build or should I just post specific questions here?  Quite interested in getting back to a 'base' build rather than with all the frilly add on bits.
Should build now. You need the portable class libraries.
